page.title: 19THE SEARCH FOR OIL AND GAS
page.content: The rock formation in this area is the same as in Dorset where gas has been found, and because of this the geologists are searching for oil and gas in Lincolnshire, and oil has been found at Welton near Lincoln. On Monday, 3rd June, 1985 a Seismic Survey was carried out in Halton Holegate, with a recording truck and four vehicle mounted Vibrators, followed by a Land Rover and a Transit Van. The route taken was up Peasgate Lane from Toynton All Saints, past the Council Houses, and up Northorpe Road, and then through the gate by the side of the Nursing Home and across the fields to Ashby. The information gathered is now being studied by petroleum geologists to estimate the possibility of oil and gas in the area.
